Class Menu

java.lang.Object
Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Saves information of the sent project object and generated a menu. The menu gives options to modify the sent project in different ways.
Version:
4.0, 25/09/2022
Author:
Ifekharul Islam

  • Method Details

    • editProj

      public void editProj(Scanner input2)
      generated a menu that lest the user to modify aspects of the project.

      User is given options to:
      Update the deadline.
      Update the contractors details.
      Update the paid amount.
      Finalise the project.
      Exit the menu.

      Parameters:
      input2 - scanner object to take user input.
      Throws:
      ParseException
